column4: My Gnome desktop and panels take forever to come up after a reboot or login.
is it waiting for something? try booting without the splash and quiet options

i think it would. you can also have a look at the boot messages. i just like watching it boot :) you can find messages in /var/log/messages for example (there are lots of messages in /var/log for all sorts of things)
do you find samba slow in general? i was forced to work on a windows network recently and the shares were really slow between computers. so samba may just be a lot slower than nfs in general
